Question: When issued it also included a copy of this personl's pamphletted lecture, Eight or Nine Wise Words About Letter-Writing.
Hints: She termed the traditional image of Dodgson "the ____l Myth".
This attack was diagnosed as possibly "epileptiform" and this personl himself later wrote of his "seizures" in the same diary.
The fame of his alter ego "this personl" soon spread around the world.
